name: Dungeons and Texteons
description:
Dungeons and Texteons is a game bullet hell top down shooter where the usual part are inverted: now the player is the dragon which is tired of being at the end of the dungeons and he wants to escape free. We interpretate  the theme not doing a text adventure but using the text for creating sprite and assets.

Inputs:

Move with WASD

Shoot with Spacebar

CrowdForge team:

https://crowdforge.io/jams/text-only-jam/teams/5125/dashboard

Programming - Gianni Vallerini : https://itch.io/profile/gianni-vallerini

Design - Anthony Santangelo: https://itch.io/profile/anthony-santangelo
